task.title: Root label
task.shortdesc: Root label of the top-level entity.

context.p: Each top-level entity must have a root_labelproperty.
The root_labelof a resource generally mirrors theroot → identified_by → Name → contentvalue.
context.note: For MARC245content, when a parallel880non-Latin script title is present, that title is used as the value of the root_label.

result.note: This example is meant to illustrate the root_labelvalue and does not represent a complete JSON-LD document.
